title: Expand holographic effects across cart page and homepage elements

requirements.text: Apply holographic gradient effects to the cart items in the Cart page, including iridescent borders around cart item containers and subtle holographic background shimmer on hover, consistent with existing holographic effects using the brand color #a932bd
acceptanceCriteria: Cart item containers display iridescent gradient borders
Cart items show subtle holographic background shimmer effect on hover
Effects use brand color #a932bd and complement existing holographic design patterns
Animation is smooth and matches the timing of other holographic effects

requirements.text: Add holographic gradient effects to the feature cards on the homepage, including animated iridescent borders and subtle holographic background gradients that create shimmer effects consistent with the vanguardist design aesthetic
acceptanceCriteria: Feature cards display animated holographic border effects
Subtle holographic background gradients are visible on the feature cards
Effects complement existing holographic elements and use the brand color palette
Hover states enhance the holographic shimmer effect

requirements.text: Apply holographic effects to the quantity controls and remove buttons in cart items, using animated gradient borders that create iridescent shimmer on hover and active states
acceptanceCriteria: Increment and decrement buttons display holographic border effects
Remove button shows iridescent gradient animation
Hover and active states enhance the holographic shimmer
Effects maintain consistency with other interactive elements

requirements.text: Add holographic gradient effects to the checkout/total price section in the cart, including an iridescent border around the total price container and subtle holographic background that emphasizes the call-to-action
acceptanceCriteria: Total price section displays prominent holographic border effect
Subtle holographic background gradient enhances visual hierarchy
Effects draw attention to the checkout area without overwhelming the content
Design maintains readability of price information

constraints: Maintain consistency with existing holographic effects already implemented on product cards, buttons, header navigation, and mega menu panels
Use the brand color #a932bd as the primary color in all holographic gradient effects
Preserve existing cart functionality and layout structure
Ensure holographic effects do not impact performance or page load times
nonGoals: Changing the cart data structure or backend cart logic
Modifying existing holographic effects on product cards, header, or mega menu
Adding new cart features beyond visual enhancements
Changing the overall layout or component structure of the cart or homepage
